attributes.bullet_text: Entities in this unit take damage, but cannot die.

skillTree.localised_description: The weight of every single insult, grievance, umbrage and ill-feeling, channelled into a single, crushing swing of the axe.
It's a crazy piece of acrobatics, for sure, but it might just work; if it does, the opponent has no chance.
All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Distinguished by his scars he may be, but since the point of being a Slayer is to die, one wonders when this one is going to start applying himself to the task at hand.

skillTree.localised_name: Army of One, Slayer of Many
skillTree.localised_description: Some people don't need friends; in fact, friends might get in the way and be accidentally killed in a particularly nasty way.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description:
Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
	(own characters in province)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description:
Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors
	(own characters in province)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: There's knowing no fear and then there's never having heard the word, let alone the concept. That's how mad you have to be go up against Ruin and win.

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca

Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)
Weapon strength: +20% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)
Weapon strength: +30% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: This one'll take on all-comers, no matter how large and hostile they may be. The way he sees it, if he dies trying, mores the better.
"Dragons? Smagons. Where is it? Come here, you, it's time to die!"

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: The living personification of courage, as the Fearless was many centuries before him.
When you've been fighting for decades, the accumulated scars start to act as a leathery carapace in their own right.
"Right across the Old World I've walked, and the New, as well. There's no corner I've not visited, no horror I've not seen... and killed."

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Many blows over many battles have hardened this warrior beyond compare, making his hide as tough as Dragon scales.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +10%
	(When this Hero is not embedded)

skillTree.localised_description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +6% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +10% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.
Sometimes it’s best to have friends in low places.
Always watching.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +4%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +4%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(own characters in region)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
"If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is a Slayer. Slayers can never have their Weapon Strength reduced during a battle.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Countless deadly combats fought, and yet none of them have fulfilled the sworn oath of this Drengi.
Countless deadly combats fought, and yet none of them have fulfilled the sworn oath of this Drengi.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +25%
	(When this Hero is not embedded)

related_attributes.bullet_text: A unit with Executioner will execute units in combat below a 20% hit points threshold.
